channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Adidas' fourth-quarter sales top expectations as final Yeezy stock sold off
item.description: Adidas on Wednesday reported an uptick in fourth-quarter sales that exceeded expectations, as the retailer sold off its last remaining Yeezy stock.

item.title: Foot Locker results show the sneaker industry — and Nike — still have more pain ahead
item.description: Foot Locker is expecting profits to be under pressure in fiscal 2025, indicating steep discounts are still present across the industry, especially at ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: CrowdStrike slumps 7% on weak earnings outlook, overhang from outage costs
item.description: CrowdStrike shares dropped 7% after it issued weak earnings guidance and signaled ongoing pressure from its global IT outage in July.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Abercrombie & Fitch shares plunge 15% after star retailer posts weak guidance for year ahead
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch's business may be leveling out after two years of explosive growth.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: CrowdStrike falls 9% on disappointing earnings forecast
item.description: CrowdStrike shares dropped more than 9% in extended trading after the cybersecurity software provider issued weaker-than-expected guidance.
